h2_title: Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: If there's any good news, its that for the first half of the fight, he'll continue to use most of the same moves as he did in the Hut of Immortality. Though you will have to be more precise in your dodging, you'll at least have an idea of what to expect.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Zhu_Bajie_(Boss_Fight).md', within the main section titled 'Zhu Bajie (Boss Fight)', specifically from the subsection 'Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
If there's any good news, its that for the first half of the fight, he'll continue to use most of the same moves as he did in the Hut of Immortality. Though you will have to be more precise in your dodging, you'll at least have an idea of what to expect.
